name: Box Shooter
description:
Welcome to Box Shooter. It was made with the help of Michigan State University Introduction to Game Development on Coursera.org.

Use WASD or Arrows to move around! Left Mouse or Space to shoot!

You have to earn enough points advance to level 2 where you have to try earn as many points as possible before time runs out! Green boxes add to your score as well as the orange boxes! The white boxes add time while the red boxes minus your time! GLHF! :D

Thank you Michigan State University for putting the Introduction to Game Development online.
